reviewtext: These are the typical hook and loop solution.  They are mostly loop, and towards the end there is a 1" piece of loop sewn on.  I found this to be rather stiff and didn't readily bend to conform to the cables I was wrapping.  8" is a nice length, but much longer than what I needed, so I ended up wrapping around a few times before trying to close it.  You could probably cut an end off, but I like longer ties, as it seems I'm constantly moving things around and I get very frustrated when I find something a few inches short.  If the 1" hook part were not as stiff I'd give it the extra star.
